message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $125 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $145.
Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer. I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you do $130?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not comfortable with $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I can offer you the product for $155.
Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to hold your ground, but I'm still not comfortable with $155. I'm willing to make one more offer. Can you do $135?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $150. I'm willing to make a small concession, so I can offer you the product for $152.
Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to hold your ground, but I'm still not comfortable with $152. I'm willing to make one more offer. Can you do $140?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $150. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer you the product for $148.
Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to hold your ground, but I'm still not comfortable with $148. I'm willing to make one more offer. Can you do $142?
